Reviews.Title: “Fabulous, Simply Fabulous!”
Reviews.Author: MJean1948
Reviews.Content: From the first contact through our stay to final communication, the entire experience has been a first rate experience. I have been in the Orlando/Disney area several times and I can say that this has been my best experience. For the rate, I kept my fingers crossed that the pictures and descriptions were truly reflective of what we received. We were not disappointed. The communications were clear and payment process efficiently handled. We had a 2 bedroom condo on the first floor because we needed a unit in which we did not have to climb stairs, etc. It had a screened patio which made sitting at night where we reviewed the day's activities or planning activities a pleasure. The clubhouse and pool were very close..steps away. We actually felt very much at home while there. The condo was quiet, immaculate, and very well furnished with a TV in each bedroom as well as the living room. Concerned about security? The condo is located in a gated community with access by a swipe of the card once you initially arrive. Your access to your condo is by entering a combination on the door. We loved this place so much that we plan to return next year....earlier than we normally would return.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome value”
Reviews.Author: Investing35
Reviews.Content: We stayed at a 2 bedroom condo, 1st floor, with the pool area and clubhouse a few steps away. Our location was perfect with two small children in tow. No steps to climb, and the pool just steps away. The kids loved the pool because they didn't have any steps to deal with getting in or out of it. You just walk right in to it... The grounds were clean, and the condo was clean and beautifully decorated with internet, TV's in the living room and both bedrooms, and all the linens and kitchen supplies we needed. Nice screened in lanai. Very short drive to Disney, shopping and restaurants. All this for a VERY reasonable price. We travel to the Disney area at least twice a year, and have stayed at other vacation condo's and homes. The others charged more, and I wasn't as impressed. My family would definitely stay at Legacy again!

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't believe this deal”
Reviews.Author: midottie
Reviews.Content: Now my grown children who we came to disney to meet up with always swear that you must stay onsite at WDW...but visiting us about 5 miles away at Legacy Dunes may have changed their minds. You can pay 230 for a night at Disneys French Quarter for all the ammenities of a Motel 6, or you can stay at Legacy Dunes with 2 BR, 2 Bath, kitchen, livroom, balcony view and laundry, flat screen TV, free wireless for $89. a night. We came to this area to watch Spring training (high school) baseball at ESPN, and we were five miles away. Daughter at French quarter had to drive as far! This condo is everything previous reviews say it is...in a gated community just past the "glitter strip" of high way 192. Plenty of places to eat on 192--including fast food, and a Walgreen too. So was very convenient the two days we drove into Disney. Expect to pay a cleaning fee if your stay is less than 4 days...this is understandable IMHO. You get in the first time by dialing a gate code that was sent to you which calls the owner/manager so he can buzz you in. Ours didn't work..but all was fixed in short order when we made the phone call to the number that comes with your reservation paperwork. And I believe him that it was a phone system upgrade glitch. I used the pool and it was lovely and uncrowded. We will stay here again. ( And I bet my kids do too!)

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at Lecagy Dunes”
Reviews.Author: Lloyd N
Reviews.Content: Great time at Legacy Dunes. Wonderful stay in clean and well appointed condo complete with washer/dryer. Appreciated wireless internet for internet search and skype. Immaculate grounds and clean pool and surroundings. Quiet condo. Convenient to Disney World; shopping; groceries; attractions yet conveniently setback from the busy road. Well-equipped fitness center. Very co-operative and helpful rental agent. Friendly atmosphere. Look forward to our return in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay and priced right”
Reviews.Author: Daryl C
Reviews.Content: This was our family of four (kids 5&9) first stay at Legacy Dunes. We were looking for a condo that was reasonably priced. We were planning to stay all day in the parks and just wanted a clean, comfortable place to spend the night that had a pool for the girls to swim in. We found it here at LD! We arrived late in the evening on our first night, but it was easy to find with our GPS. After a few minutes trying to figure out the security gate we made it to our 2nd floor (2 bedroom) condo which was well lit and we felt safe. The condo layout is spacious and the washer and dryer was a big hit! I especially loved the big screen tv's and the private balcony overlooking the pond. We stayed for 6 days here and didn't regret it. The girls loved the pool which wasn't heated when we were there, but I read it is heated now. We had the pool to ourselves 90% of the time! No lifeguard on duty but the pool is a zero entry style and well laid out. Our only difficulty the entire stay was one eventing when returning from Disney and we couldn't get into our room because the battery on the electric door lock failed (at midnight). I called the number provided to us and left a message. Anthony called me back within a few minutes and told us over the phone how to get in - no problem. I would recommend this place to those who are looking for an alternative to a hotel/motel. The price was very reasonable which attracted us to this place to begin with. The grounds are well kept and there is a huge super Target right down the street and only 8 minutes from Animal Kingdom (if you know what you're doing). If the kids don't like swimming there isn't much else for them to do but our kids love the water so they were happy - and so were we.

Reviews.Title: “Legacy Dunes--a beautiful place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Couzins
Reviews.Content: Our month-long stay at Legacy Dunes was very enjoyable. Beautiful grounds, well equipped condo poolside, convenient to shopping and Disney World. Very friendly atmosphere, too. We took full advantage of the fitness center and the now- heated pool! Try it !

Reviews.Title: “Family Vacation.”
Reviews.Author: Dave B
Reviews.Content: As this was our 1st family vacation we were nervious about what to expect! All our worries were put to rest when we pulled up to the resort! The condo that we rented was the 2 bedroom Simbas pride condo, and it suited our needs perfectly. It was clean, spacious and very inviting! The gounds of the resort were in the same impecable condition as the condo. From the pool and weight room to the exceptionally friendly people. It was also in very close proximity to Disney, grocery stores and restaurants. Also I'd like to mention the rental company; they were fantastic and made this experience so easy and enjoyable. We will definatly be renting at this resort again in the upcoming year. To be honest i will not stay at a hotel in these parts again!

Reviews.Title: “stay at legacy dunes condo for 4 days”
Reviews.Author: karfamily
Reviews.Content: Our stay was very relaxing. Its close proximity to the Disney World theme parks is a plus and all grocery stores and essential items are very close. The condo is very spacious, clean and great for a family of 4-6 people.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful condo not much to the resort.”
Reviews.Author: Beverly D
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Legacy Dunes from 29th December 2011 to 5th January 2012. Booked through Go Disney, a site that I had seen recommended. We found Anthony from Go Disney very helpful and easily found the condo we wanted with three bedrooms, as we have a 21 and 14 year old boy and girl. Had significant difficulty when we first arrived as the block looked boarded up in the dark and all of the condo numbers were covered with tape. We were very tired after 20 hours travelling and being up at 4am UK time and when we located what we thought was the condo the code would not work in the door. Fortunately after a few tries we managed to call through to Scott, Anthony's business partner and he managed to get us into the condo via a key box code. We did have a very stressful half an hour before this as there was no-one around and there seemed to be no caretaker or night staff at the resort. Once in the condo we were pleasantly surprised. It was lovely, clean and welcoming after such a long journey (and driving around Orlando for three hours trying to find the resort as the hire company had no sat navs and apart from the address we had no other directions). The following day it became clear why it looked boarded up as the outside was being painted and everything had been covered with paper and masking tape.We enjoyed the condo very much but had mixed views about the resort. It seems that it is not just a holiday resort but a permanent home for some people. It didn't seem to have any atmosphere and on our one trip to the clubhouse there was nothing and no-one there. The pool seemed nice but as the weather was not very warm we did not try it. My husband used the gym a few times and found it satisfactory for his needs. In the main it felt as if the condo was a little oasis for us after the bustle of theme parks and Orlando and suited our needs as somewhere to relax. My big big complaint however is in the design of the blocks themselves. There are three floors to each block and access to the second and third floors is via a metal staircase which is bolted onto the outside of the building. Every time someone came up or down those stairs the noise was horrendous. In the bedroom in which my husband and I slept the stairs were attached to the wall at the head of our bed. There was a picture on the wall which rattled as the whole wall vibrated with the movement of the stairs. This was not so bad in the daytime but at night it was very disturbing and irritating. On a couple of occasions we had an earlyish night and were woken by people running up the stairs and when the trash was collected each night the room almost shook and the vibrations came through the head of the bed. What idiot would design staircases like this. They should be forced to live there for a while and experience the impact. I imagine if you rent a condo on the other side of the entranceway you would escape this intrusion but it was very annoying. In short it was a lovely condo in an area suited to travel to Disney Parks, but resulting in a lot of travelling in traffic if you want to go out to International Drive or to the Universal Theme Parks. The resort had nothing to offer to tourists so if you are looking for a base in Orlando to travel out from this is OK, but if you are looking for more from the resort on days off from Theme Parks etc or just a place to relax by the pool with some amenities I would not recommend this as the place to stay. There are other condo rentals that fill the gap between hotels and apartments, with services for guests where you would want to chill out for a day or two.

Reviews.Title: “Great 4 days”
Reviews.Author: Blanca Z
Reviews.Content: Great decision making my reservations to spend 4 lovely days in Orlando. Condo was perfect for my family, everyone had a great time, it was very spacious for the 8 of us. I will defenitely consider renting one more time with no hesitation. Blanca and her family

Reviews.Title: “Legacy Dunes thru GoDIsney”
Reviews.Author: TravelNurse1
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a stay at Legacy Dunes week after Christmas. Went with hubbie, sons(14,13) and their cousin(13). I have gotten spoiled using our family timeshare and have stayed at several condos in the area. Nothing beats the space, added bathrooms and W/D!Wanted this especially since I was the only female. This time I was not using the timeshare so I was searching for a good price. Came across this condo and godisneyvacation.com. Reviews looked good so I contacted them. Prompt response from Anthony. Very courteous and booked us quickly in a 4brm/2ba condo that slept 10 for only $120/nt! That was cheaper than two med quality hotel rooms. Same price or cheaper tha some single rooms! I started to get worried because I found a forum that said they post good reviews of themselves to look good. I had already paid so we decided to take a chance. Arrived late and used code given to open gate. It called Scott who works for godisney and we heard a voicemail msg. This was concerning after a 12hr car ride. One side of the gate was ajar and we were able to drive thru. We did not leave a msg. He may have been waiting for the msg to open the gate so I can't really say if that was a issue. Nxt morning, gate was fixed. We had the dalmation condo. It's a older complex. Condo was older. Floors a little uneven but baths n kitchen remodled. A/C fan necessary to keep moisture smell away. Decor a little older but condo clean and spacious. Only complaints I had was I wish there were comforters on beds,channel guides for the tv because that was a little confusing, and better shower heads/water pressure. Also 2nd queen room didn't have tv as advertised. Condo was well stocked with basics and then some (Swiffer sweeper, vac). We did not use the amenities because we were at the parks all day. Yes, I have stayed at more posh condos but I would definitely use and recommend godisneyvacations.com when trying to get the most for your dollar.

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT place, but AWFUL PLAYGROUND!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Orlandofun6
Reviews.Content: Perfect resort, perfect location, perfectly clean. I love this place however, the playground was very sad. Its got such great potential, but it looks very dangerous and is falling apart. That was really a major let down :(

Reviews.Title: “Go Disney Vacation - Legacy Dunes - Jungle Condo”
Reviews.Author: FamilyTraveller45
Reviews.Content: Just spent the last week in the Jungle Condo. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay the week. Everything about the place was fantastic, infact it is hard to put how awesome the place was into words. The pricing couldn't be beat for starters. More importantly, the cleanliness, the spaciousness, decorating were all impeccable. We would recommend this resort to all family and friends. Anthony took excellent care of our details prior to arrival and per his email regarding the front gate and the keyless entry, everything went as smoothly as it possible could. We enjoyed the Condo's amenities, including pool, clubhouse, and gym. We used the laundry machine located in the condo everyday. The only dirty clothes we took home were the ones we drove home in. Thats the perfect way to end a vacation, no dirty clothes to deal with at home. We spent hours looking for the right condo on VRBO and other rental websites When we found the Go Disney Vacation website, we hit the jackpot!! Anthony will definitely have our repeat business. Regarding the pricing, we could stay on Disney property, but the outrageous cost for Disney is not worth it. We had our own quiet jungle to retreat to each night. I've stayed in the Contemporary, Poly, and Port Orleans, hands down, including the bus service Disney offers, this place is in a league of its own. One that is much, much better. Thanks Anthony! BV

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay”
Reviews.Author: dalejen1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the animal kingdom condo and our stay was fantastic! The condo was very nice and the kids loved the zero entry pool. We also took a look at Windsor Palms during our stay and both locations were very nice. Please take a look at www.godisneyvactions.com. Thank you for allowing us to stay in your condo we plan to return!!

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and would recommend to friends and family!”
Reviews.Author: mburgess5558
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with our 2 grandsons, ages 11 & 14. Very clean and spacious condos. An added bonus is the washer & dryer in the condo. The resort is located close enough to DisneyWorld that we could go to one of the parks in the morning, then back to condo for lunch and rest, then return to Disney to enjoy the evening. Also, very nice & clean swimming pool that we used daily! We rented this condo through "Go Disney Vacation." The pictures that are on the website are exactly what the condo looks like. There have times when we have rented condos in the past and the pictures have been very misleading. So, we were very pleased to see that the pictures were not misleading at all! We checked in on Sunday afternoon and discovered that the internet was not working. I called the property owner and within 30 mins the owner and manager came over and fixed it. I was very impressed with this service! This is a place we would definitely stay at again!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely amazing deal! Best value for your dollar!”
Reviews.Author: Ron_From_Tampa
Reviews.Content: My family and I would like to express our extreme appreciation for making our mini vacation this past weekend in Orlando a truly memorable one. We were absolutely astounded and truly impressed by the quality of the condo along with the affordable price. We have stayed at several locations before and this was absolutely the best for the money. My hat is off to you and yours and we have already started bragging about our stay at the resort. You guys are amazing with what you offer and we are glad that we found you online at GODISNEYVACATION.COM. When we first got there I called the phone number listed because there was only one gate card and my kids were going to be joining us later on. I spoke to Scott who was very professional and very apologetic because one of the cards were missing. Within ten minutes he was knocking at the door with a replacement. Thank you again so much for such a smooth transaction and for making our stay that much more enjoyable. We are definitely spreading the word around to all our friends and co-workers and we are hoping to return again during the next few months. Just to let everyone else know. We stayed at the castle-themed condo for a few days last weekend. It was the most incredible place. We needed a place for six people and I found the condo on www.godisneyvacation.com. We paid $79 per night!!! Now think about it. There were six of us. If we had gone to a "regular" hotel, we would need at least two rooms. Some people would need three rooms for six people. Two rooms would have been at least $200 per night. For the $79 we kinda thought that we were just getting a place to sleep. Boy were we wrong! The condo was immaculate. There were three flat-screen tv's hung on the walls, one in each room. There was hi-speed wireless connection, a stereo with an ipod dock in the living room, another in the master bedroom and a boom-box on the fridge. The condo also came equipped with washer, dryer, stove with oven, microwave, blender, toaster, lots of dishes, pot, pans, cutlery. It was decorated very tastefully with artwork, vases and other items. There were lots of towels and linen. There was an iron, ironing board, vacuum and hairdryer. Obviously we didn't need all this but I am just trying to show the lengths at which the went to make their guests comfortable. There were even a stack of children games in the castle room and lots of books in the master bedroom. The AC works flawlessly, but because my mom was with us and she gets cold quickly we couldn't keep it too cool. If you are looking for a place to stay for your Disney stay, don't even bother to look any further. Just go on the website and book it. Don't thank me now. Just come back here and say exactly what you think about the place. We have paid a lot more for a lot less. This place is definitely worth every single penny that you will spend for it. It makes your vacation so much more enjoyable when you find something this good!!! Ron B

Reviews.Title: “We will never stay at a hotel inside Disney World again!”
Reviews.Author: shan13_11
Reviews.Content: We just got back from our stay at the condo and we couldn't have loved it more. I am still amazed that we stayed at such an awesome place for a great price. We didn't want to leave. The main reason we picked this condo was for the Animal Kingdom theme and we were not disappointed in any way. My daughter kept saying, "I'm in giraffe heaven!" It was so nice to have a 2 bedroom place so the girls could go to bed and my husband and I could relax and watch TV and enjoy the vacation as well. It was conveniently located near Disney World and local necessities, grocery stores, etc. The place was spotless and it was nice to come home from the parks everyday and make a nice meal rather than eating out fastfood all week long. We loved this place and would go back in a second. Thank you Anthony for such a great experience from beginning to end.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED Legacy Dunes!!!”
Reviews.Author: brathjens
Reviews.Content: After some last minute issues with not being able to stay at a family time share, we were scrambling to find suitable lodging for me, my husband and kids. I found a review here on Trip Advisor where the user recommended the folks at godisneyvacation.com. I was a little reluctant as their website didn't allow me to see what was available or book online. I'm glad I ended up calling them anyway, and I was told to go ahead and submit an email request for one of the condos and someone would get right back to me. Well, let's say that Scott & Anthony were AWESOME to work with from godisneyvacation.com and hooked us up with a fantastic condo for only $69/night. I booked for 4 nights, and on our way down to Florida I realized we would be arriving early and called Anthony and asked if the condo was available for one more night (that night!) and he was able to hook it up for us! The best thing of course was the condo was in immaculate condition, flat screen tv's in the living room and bedroom, full kitchen, the kids had a wonderful time, plus the pool was fantastic. The zero entry pool was a big hit with our kids! FREE high speed & wireless internet & parking, what more could you want. And the location was so close to Disney we couldn't believe it - and this is coming from a family that has stayed onsite and offsite many times. We loved our experience here and will definitely be booking here again. Give Go Disney Vacation a call and try it out!

Reviews.Title: “I will be happy to return to this resort.”
Reviews.Author: hopestar2004
Reviews.Content: I went through "Go Disney Vacation" and was very excited from the moment we started to plan our Disney vacation. We planned our vacation around where we were staying. We stayed at legacy dunes and the location couldnt have been more perfect. The condo was very clean and had everything we needed and wanted to include a very nice pool. I will most definitly stay here again as we are now planning a Sea World trip. Jessie Hoover Balimore MD

Reviews.Title: “Location is just write....”
Reviews.Author: jasas1971
Reviews.Content: Location is excellent.... easy access to the attractions of florida....but far enough for your own space to relax.... ammenities onsite are great, pool and gym, ample parking.... grounds are nice and clean... would recommend to anyone who wants a break in Kissimmee.... just a shame we had to come home.... :-(

Reviews.Title: “Go Disney Vacation”
Reviews.Author: JerandLu84
Reviews.Content: We booked our stay at Legacy Dunes through GODISNEYVACATION.COM. Anthony and Scott were great to work with. The condo was much more than we expected. It was everything that was promised and MORE. We stayed 5 weeks and are already booking our stay for next year. A Great place to stay for singles, couples and families.

Reviews.Title: “A great experience”
Reviews.Author: ogradytom
Reviews.Content: We stayed in number 3103 through GoDisneyVacation and we were thrilled with the place.There were a few minor hiccups on the way, but the condo was basically "as advertised". Better than advertised actually. I undertand there can be a difference from owner to owner in the development, but the complaints we had were very minor and in no way ruined our vacation. The property at large: The pool was very nice, the tennis court was well maintained and they did an acceptable job at maintaining the outdoor property. The cafe advertised is only open 3 days a week and the woman who runs it is a chatter box. Lovely, but we were just trying to sit by the pool and relax. The gym equipment was acceptable. A little dated, but serviceable. GoDisneyVacation condo: Fantastic. Had everything we could need and then some. The beds were very firm and squeaky. But really just a minor annoyance. The place was not cleaned when we arrived after 3, but a quick call and they came right out and cleaned it in an hour while we sat at the pool. The owner provided tennis rackets and balls for the kids to go play, boogie boards, local tourism literature...you name it. It was a fantastic find. To get this kind of property in Disney would cost you almost per day what we paid per week. Thank you GoDisneyVacations.

Reviews.Title: “Perfection!”
Reviews.Author: cheer17
Reviews.Content: Went to this hotel for a vacation in June, loved every second of it! The themed rooms are amazing. It's so close to Disney, which is the whole reason we went to Florida. One complaint, that you have to tell them when your room needs cleaning & you have to pay extra. Other than that, great place to stay!!(:

Reviews.Title: “Condo at Legacy Dunes is just the thing”
Reviews.Author: RussellSW19
Reviews.Content: Legacy Dunes is a great place to stay. It is within 10-15 minutes drive to everything. Legacy Dunes Resort is excellent. The chief attraction is the tropical swimming pool but tennis courts/volleyball are there. There is a clubhouse/cafe/fitness center. We rented a 2 bed/2 bath condo which we found in the Vacation/Holiday rentals section on Trip Advisor.

Reviews.Title: “The absolute best trip to Florida we have ever taken - Thanks to Go Disney Vacation!!”
Reviews.Author: assunta20
Reviews.Content: This was our first time booking a rental property in Florida and we are so happy we did so. We felt very comfortable staying there since it felt like home. It was beautifully furnished and done very tasteful. My children liked the bedroom with their own private TV and DVD along with the movies and games. Go Disney Vacation explained everything to us in detail regarding the condo and everything was just as they described it to be. I loved the fact that it was in a gated community and the key pad code to the front door was an excellent idea. What a wonderful trip. One thing I wished we could have changed was the duration of the stay. Two weeks was too short. Next time we will be looking into a longer stay. Thanks to everyone especially Go Disney Vacation!

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT LOCATION PERFECT PRICE”
Reviews.Author: ArchanaSharma
Reviews.Content: This two bedroom condo is perfect for a family visiting Disney. It is located close to everything, restaurants, gas station, grocery stores, gift shops and Disney. Less than 15 minutes away from Disney World. We loved the decor, the cleanliness, the convenience and the price. Our girls loved their room with the bunk beds. We would stay here again if we were visiting Disney or Orlando. "Old Town" is five minutes away which is a great little amusement park for the kids. And the price is unbeatable! We have already recommended it to friends. Looks at pictures at www.godisneyvacation.com. Cannot recommend it enough!

Reviews.Title: “5 Star Condo for a 3 Star Price”
Reviews.Author: SarahRittersdorf
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently stayed at Legacy Dunes in September. We were extremely satisfied with our condo, the location, and the amenities. We feel very lucky to have discovered this great place at an amazing price! The condo had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. We were just a few miles away from all major highways, theme parks and shopping. I would recommend staying at LD over any overpriced hotel in the area! We are definitely coming back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Magical; our first family vacation!!”
Reviews.Author: CayGurl
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time and were truly very pleased, impressed and comfortable with our accommodations at Legacy Dunes and this condo. From the moment we arrived my husband could not stop saying how very impressed he was with the accommodations and our two boys absolutely LOVED what they called their "new home" :) The convenience to all the parks, shopping and great dining was wonderful and the security of being in a well maintained and gated property was amazing.This was our first family vacation, and hopefully the start of many more future vacay's here at Legacy. :D

Reviews.Title: “Kids loved it and we did too!”
Reviews.Author: florida16
Reviews.Content: We stayed at "Tigger's Fun Spot" condo just this past March. Upon arriving the clubhouse was very nice and the staff there were very friendly. We went to the condo right away and the pictures didn't do the condo justice as it was beautiful! The kids LOVED the pool! We were close to everything and just a 7 minute drive to Disney! The owners are Canadian and as we are too, we felt comfortable with the renting process. The property management company is great! They checked in with us upon our arrival to ensure we had settled in well and we had no problems during our stay. It was tough deciding on a condo to rent initially as there are so many out there, but we are glad that we found this one. If we are coming back to Florida....this will be our first choice! My only recommendation would be a pull out couch as if we had brought my mother along, there wouldn't have been enough sleeping space.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! What a great value.”
Reviews.Author: KrazyFamilyLI
Reviews.Content: This place was so much more than I expected. I booked my trip through a website called " GoDisneyVacation.com". They assured me that this place was a great place for me and my family and that it was clean and close to Disney. They sure lived up to their promise. Our place was neat, clean and newly decorated. My kids loved the animal themed bedrooms buy most of all enjoyed the resort style pool with the fountains that they got to run and play in. I loved the fact that they had an excercise room. We saved so much money by preparing meals at the condo. We were so close to Disney that we were able to come back to eat lunch and enjoy some down time before we went back to the parks in the evening and to watch the fireworks. This place is well worth it. We had a great time. We are already saving for our next Disney trip and will be back to Legacy Dunes.

Reviews.Title: “Furnishing are fine, cleanliness is something to be desired!”
Reviews.Author: SheshaNd
Reviews.Content: Our room was nicely furnished and the layout is good however, the floors are filthy. All floors in kitchens and bathrooms were dirty and the carpet looked as if it's seen many parties with no cleanup. Thankful for the washing machine as our socks were black. Pets were not allowed but the person accross the hall had 3 dogs and didn't bother cleaning up after them. My daughter steped in dog..... and we were all able to enjoy the stench in our vehicle.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect in all ways. Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: loveholidaysKent
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Legacy for three nights (wish it could have been longer). The pools, gym, apartment and grounds were all lovely. Can't wait to go back in December witht he kids.

Reviews.Title: “Spring Break at Legacy Dunes”
Reviews.Author: AlabamaMoma
Reviews.Content: Wow! Wow! Wow! My family and I stayed at the Legacy Dunes. We had booked the trip through E Tour and Travel, so we were apprehensive. We were pleasantly surprised that our room was immaculately cleaned and modern. The rooms were SUPER spacious. My mother-in-law was also with us. She is single and lives alone. She said she would love to rent the place to live. The pool and fitness center is nice. The only negative is there is no maid service. It truly is a home away from home. The resort does provide you with all the conveniences of home in the room including a washer and dryer. So, it was nice to not have to take home a weeks worth of dirty laundry. The resort is conviently located near Disney. Only people staying at the resort are allowed entry. I would definately stay at the Legacy Dunes again. However, if you like being catered to with services such as room service or maid service, Legacy Dunes is not the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!!!”
Reviews.Author: MsSuze
Reviews.Content: So Legacy Dunes was absolutely beautiful. Any negative reviews are false. It was very clean. The only problem was that it was far from the nightclubs and the beach but we took care of that problem. Overall, definitely recommend this resort to everybody!

Reviews.Title: “Don't go here”
Reviews.Author: Valarie6
Reviews.Content: This resort does not seem like a resort. The pool is not heated. There is no housekeeping service unless you want to pay extra for it. There are no hair dryers so bring your own. We needed more dishes and we were going to be charged for them, and not even a deposit to be refunded when returned. We asked for extra chairs and were flatly turned down. The smoke was beeping, removed for servicing , and never replaced. We had to launder our own towels since what we had was it. The check in staff were very nice but were brand new (3 days) and did not know anything about the property - and were working alone. The evening staff were also pleasant but also brand new ( one day - and working alone). Maintenance were very helpful and pleasant but can only do so much. There is a raggedy tennis court, and some sort of netted cage. The fitness center is very good, and there is a new bar that opened and is also very nice.

HotelInfo.Name: Legacy Dunes Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 6365 Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34747
